CustomField.formula: if (NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Account__r.Name)) && CONTAINS(Referral_Account__r.Name, "Huntington Bank") ,"Huntington Bank" ,if (NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Account__r.Name)) && CONTAINS(Referral_Account__r.Name, "Keybank") ,"Keybank", IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Contact__r.Flex_Online_Account_Username__c)) && CONTAINS(Referral_Contact__r.Flex_Online_Account_Username__c, "-ACCT"), "Accountant", Referral_Account__r.Name)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the Referral Account linked to the Opportunity
CustomField.label: Referral Account Name
